title: General Public Palliative Care Education Program: Dialogue Skills and Practical Training Reinforcement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Medical Terminology and Foundational Communication Skills
context.additional_context: Mathematics curriculum-integrated activities applying data analysis and statistical reasoning.

learning_goals: Learners understand core concepts of palliative care and can apply effective communication skills with patients and families through real-world case studies.
Learners can design and implement conversation scenarios with patients suffering from severe illnesses through team-based simulation activities.
Learners can analyze palliative care-related data (e.g., frequency of conversations, engagement levels) and visually represent the results through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
